description: An identification of a personnel capability used during a specified segment response shall be presented as personnel actual.
title: Personnel actual
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The related object(s) makes up part of this personnel actual as the whole
The values in the personnel actual property are for this personnel actual.
A cross-model association to element in the personnel model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated personnel class or set of personnel classes specified

A cross-model association to element in the personnel model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated person or set of persons specified. Typically, either personnel class or person is specified, but not both

links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.
Not part of the Standard Specs.

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Additional information about the process segment

links.dtdl:name: spatialDefinition
links.dtdl:description: Spatially defines the equipment as a zero-dimensional point, one dimensional line, or two dimensional shape or three dimensional solid.

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

operationalLocation.title: Operational location
operationalLocation.description: Identifies the operational location of the personnel resource(s)  specified by this personnel segment specification

operationalLocationType.title: Operational location type
operationalLocationType.description: Indicates whether the operational location attribute refers to an operational location object or contains a description of the operational location. Mandatory where an operational location attribute is specified

oneOf.title: Operational Location
oneOf.description: operational location attribute references an operational location;

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: operational location attribute contains a description of the operational location, such as a street address.

personnelUse.title: Personnel use
personnelUse.description: Defines the actual use of the personnel class or personnel in the context of the parent segment

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Specifies the personnel resource used for the parent segment

quantityUnitOfMeasure.title: Quantity unit of measure
quantityUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure of the associated quantity
